ing: 4 teaspoons fat-free creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip FreeÂ®)
2 drops hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste
des: "Delicious pork that can be served on sandwiches, crackers, or just on the side with another salad. Best if left in fridge at least 4 hours before serving. Great next day, too."
ins:
Mix the pork, celery, and green onions in a large bowl.
Combine the mustard, creamy salad dressing, horseradish, hot pepper sauce, and salt in blender. Blend to make a saucy dressing, about 1 minute. Lightly toss the dressing with the pork mixture. Cover and refrigerate until serving.
